content.text: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion and mushroom soup mix
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 (1 ounce) package dry onion and mushroom soup mix" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Score roast on top and sides, and place in a medium sized oven bag.
2) Combine water, soup mix, and Worcestershire sauce; pour over roast.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "water"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "soup mix"@18:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "Worcestershire sauce"@32:52 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "pour"@54:58 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( "roast"@64:69 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Place oven bag on a roasting pan.
5) Place roast in oven, and immediately reduce heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "roast"@9:14 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "oven"@18:22 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "reduce"@40:46 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-5-1 "heat"@47:51 / TOOL )
		:gol ( temp-5-0 "300 degrees F"@55:68 / TEMPERATURE )
		:gol ( temp-5-1 "150 degrees C"@70:83 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Bake for 1 1/2 hours for medium well done, or adjust time for desired doneness.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "1 1/2 hours"@12:23 / DUR )
		:prp ( purp-6-0 "for medium well done"@24:44 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "adjust"@49:55 / AC
		:ppt ( "time"@56:60 / OTHER )
		:prp ( purp-6-1 "for desired doneness"@61:81 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
